name: Wind Up
description:
Let's enter the wonderful world of Wind Up! In this haunted castle, you will get suspicious of each other as clockwork dolls. Here you will experience——

※Day-Night Cycle

The day is clockwork dolls' home field, while the night is the stage of the imposters. Judge the situation to gain advantages for your team.

※Cooperation and Escape

Work together to complete the tasks, find the exit, and race against time to escape from the castle. Enjoy the sense of accomplishment brought by the teamwork!

※Hunt and Survival

Imposters will show their true appearances and kill clockwork dolls when night falls. Clockwork dolls need to use all means to survive. An exciting chase will happen at night!

※Hotly Debate

During the day, clockwork dolls have the right to hold a meeting to accuse someone. You can argue fiercely, and persuade others to vote for your rivals and expel them.
